siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We lost the first thirteen minutes of this week’s episode due to Jon’s internet going down, so we had to do a take two. This led into a discussion of all things Narnia and Lord of The Rings. From there we touch on episode 6 of WandaVision, the M1 MacBook Air and…

frontmatter.title: The Inklings of Stan and Jon
